headline: Why Revvity (RVTY) Stock Is Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of life sciences company Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs.

raw.summary: Shares of life sciences company Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs.

headline: Revvity Establishes In Vivo Imaging Center of Excellence in North Carolina
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., September 02, 2025--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today announced the opening of its new In Vivo Imaging Center of Excellence in Morrisville, North Carolina, the heart of the state’s Research Triangle. The center consolidates Revvity’s expertise and resources to drive R&D innovation and create the next generation of imaging systems backed by AI software tools and other advanced technologies.
